name: Trump Out (CatTsunami)
description:
Think you can stop Donald Trump from running away with the US presidential election in 2020? Step into the ring as Democratic candidate Joe Biden & prove what you are capable of!

Trump Out features Joe Biden as its playable character as he goes toe-to-toe against Donald Trump in the boxing ring to settle the US election.

Equipped with all-new 2D sprites, Trump Out sports a retro-gaming aesthetic seeking inspiration from Nintendo's Punchout series & is a natural fit in the modern world of mobile gaming. Trump Out successfully maintains Punchout's nostalgic feel, while its incorporation of present-day characters & intuitive player controls ensures a fresh & enjoyable user experience.
